segments.text: Alice , I never knew you had such a lovely voice . You really can sing , can't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Mark . I used to be a member of the school choir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder you can control your voice so well . You are a professional singer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you are flattering me . I wouldn't say I am a professional , but I did receive some training at school . My music teacher used to be a professional singer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , a good teacher makes good students .
segments.speaker: S1
